query: amiodarone cardioversion rhythm control atrial fibrillation conversion rate success
title: Guidelines for the clinical management of atrial fibrillation: a practical perspective
authors: Thierry Fumeaux, Jacques Cornuz, Ralf Polikar, Edouard Blanc, Alain Junod, Lukas Kappenberger, Pascal Nicod, Jürg Schläpfer
reference: Fumeaux, T., Cornuz, J., Polikar, R., Blanc, E., Junod, A., Kappenberger, L., Nicod, P., & Schläpfer, J. (2004). Guidelines for the clinical management of atrial fibrillation: A practical perspective. Swiss Medical Weekly, 134, 235–247.
